revision.text:
As you earn achievements, you gain up to 100% (per region) more [[Poké Dollar|Money]], [[Dungeon Tokens]] and Experience from all sources. Your [[Pokémon Statistics#Click Attack|Click Attack]] is also boosted by the achievement percentage. The '''Achievement Tracker''' is unlocked after catching 110 total Pokémon. There is an additional 100% Achievement Bonus obtainable from non-regional Achievements. Thus, the maximum Achievement bonus at any time is always as follows:

\text{Maximum Achievement Bonus} = \text{100%} \times \text{Region Number} + \text{100%}

==Achievements== ===Money=== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Description !! Bonus Percentage |- | My First Hundo || Obtain 100 Pokédollars || +0.23% |- | I Should Buy a PokéMart || Obtain 1,000 Pokédollars || +0.45% |- | A Small Fortune || Obtain 10,000 Pokédollars || +0.68% |- | Annual Wage || Obtain 100,000 Pokédollars || +0.90% |- | Pfft, I Don't Need a Bike Voucher || Obtain 1,000,000 Pokédollars || +1.13% |- | A billion Poképennies || Obtain 10,000,000 Pokédollars || +2.26% |}

revision.text:
As you earn achievements, you gain up to 100% (per region) more [[Poké Dollar|Money]], [[Dungeon Tokens]] and Experience from all sources. Your [[Pokémon Statistics#Click Attack|Click Attack]] is also boosted by the achievement percentage. The '''Achievement Tracker''' is unlocked after catching 110 total Pokémon. There is an additional 100% Achievement Bonus obtainable from non-regional Achievements. Thus, the maximum Achievement bonus at any time is always as follows:

\text{Maximum Achievement Bonus} = \text{100%} \times \text{Region Number} + \text{100%}

As you earn achievements, you gain up to 100% (per region) more [[Poké Dollar|Money]], [[Dungeon Tokens]] and Experience from all sources. Your [[Pokémon Statistics#Click Attack|Click Attack]] is also boosted by the achievement percentage. The '''Achievement Tracker''' is unlocked after catching 110 total Pokémon. There is an additional 100% Achievement Bonus obtainable from non-regional Achievements. Thus, the maximum Achievement bonus at any time is always as follows:

\text{Maximum Achievement Bonus} = \text{100%} \times \text{Region Number} + \text{100%}

Your [[Pokémon Statistics#Click Attack|Click Attack]] is also boosted by the achievement percentage. The '''Achievement Tracker''' is unlocked after catching 110 total Pokémon. There is an additional 100% Achievement Bonus obtainable from non-regional Achievements. Thus, the maximum Achievement bonus at any time is always as follows:

\text{Maximum Achievement Bonus} = \text{100%} \times \text{Region Number} + \text{100%}
